quest.name: Of Mothers and Merchants
journal: The well-dressed attendant has been sneaking glances at you since the moment you entered the Agora.
objectives: Wait near the table reserved by House Leveilleur.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: You are... Pray forgive my directness, but you are none other than MadamMaster Surname, are you not?

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: (-Meryld-)It is a pleasure to finally make your acquaintance. I am Meryld, a humble servant of House Leveilleur.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: (-Meryld-)I have heard that you are an exemplary artisan, is this true? If so, I should hope you will be intrigued by a proposal from my employer.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: (-Meryld-)You see, Lady Ameliance has been focused on a rather important social welfare endeavor of late, and seeks the aid of an artisan possessed of talent commensurate to the task at hand.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: (-Meryld-)That glint in your eye tells me you wish to know more, so I invite you to speak with her in person. As fortune would have it, she is available at this very moment...

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: (-Meryld-)You needn't say another word; I shall arrange a seat for you under the House Leveilleur reservation. Pray make your way to the Last Stand at your earliest convenience, and await Lady Ameliance's arrival.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: (-???-)Forename! I presume it was Meryld who sent you hither!

dialogue.name: FLHAMINN
dialogue.text: Lured by the prospect of fresh endeavors, no doubt. I myself am guilty of the same─our Lady Leveilleur's correspondence has been full of the most tantalizing hints of late...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Surprise, surprise. What, not happy to see me?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: <cough> I think I may be coming down with something...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I just remembered, I, uh... I left my oven fire burning at home.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Relax, this ain't my venture. I'm here at F'lhaminn's invitation.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: At the very least, I insist you join us for a cup of tea. Do sit down.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: ...I see. So the Studium is to begin accepting foreign students, is it?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Yes. As you know, Sharlayan has long closed its borders and avoided interfering in the affairs of other nations, bound by a single-minded focus to secure the safety of the peoples of this star.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: With the Final Days averted, the need for such drastic measures has dissipated. It took an awfully long time, and the near end of the world, but the winds of change have begun to blow─Sharlayan is trying to become an open nation.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: That said, not all students can afford the costs incurred by studying abroad, let alone the steep price of the Studium's tuition. I can scarcely imagine how those from nations who suffered the worst of the Final Days might attempt such a feat.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: To ease the financial burden, I plan to offer all necessary school supplies free of charge. Furthermore, I have already begun talks with a number of Sharlayan families to propose an academic homestead program.

dialogue.name: FLHAMINN
dialogue.text: My, what a lovely initiative. A good old-fashioned cultural exchange is sure to be a mutually enlightening experience for the many Sharlayans who've remained cooped up with their dusty old tomes.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Such is my hope. Alas, you will recall that a great deal of the Leveilleur fortune was poured into outfitting the Ragnarok, yes?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: As such, I cannot hope to carry out this endeavor long-term without a financial backer...a partner, if you will.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I'm all for noble causes, but you can't possibly be suggestin' we provide everythin' for free.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Oh, but of course I am! Were I to require students to repay the sum of their tuition after graduating─a sum few could afford─it would be no different from a loan, after all.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I see... Well, I wish I could help, but with no prospect of income, I must respectfully decline your offer. It's not my intent to be rude, but I run a business, not a charity.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I completely understand.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Recently, I find myself reminiscing over the time I spent in the Dravanian hinterlands...Fourchenault, the children, and myself─we were all so happy, living in the Emporium.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Idle though it may now be, the town was once tremendously effervescent, filled to the brim with inquiring souls who traveled from every corner of Eorzea in the pursuit of knowledge.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Of course, it was not solely prospective students and researchers who journeyed there─far from it. As a hub for seekers of knowledge, no small few merchants made a living by procuring research supplies. In turn, they had immediate access to a reservoir of cutting-edge inventions.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Come to think of it, I daresay my contact at the East Aldenard Trading Company will be intrigued to hear of similar possibilities arising from our program. It was so very kind of Tataru to introduce us...

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: ...The East Aldenard Trading Company?

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (Hold on a minute, now... What in the hells could possibly be giving this woman the confidence to act so bafflingly indifferent?)

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (...Her husband's supposed to be a bigwig in that Forum o' theirs, ain't he? Stands to reason she may've heard rumblings of Sharlayan investing deeper in its education system. And in that case, it'd be wiser to invest now to reap the benefits later...)

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: (Better yet, the students who end up attending'll be the best and brightest o' their respective nations. If I make 'em feel indebted to me now, they'll be obligated to repay the favor in the future...once they've become powerful, distinguished members o' society, o' course.)

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: ...I will also have need of a skilled artisan to procure the necessary supplies─no doubt the demand is sure to be immense!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Goodness, just look at me prattle on when you've no interest in the matter! I really must be getting on home─countless preparations need be made ere my distinguished guest arrives.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: ...Hold that thought.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: I've come around to your proposal.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: Aye, and as your partner, the House of Splendors pledges its considerable support for your endeavor. An investment for the future, let's call it.

dialogue.name: ROWENA
dialogue.text: That is, on one condition: Forename must be the sole supplier.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: My, how fortuitous! I did not expect you to pledge your support, but full glad am I that you have. Together, we can give countless students the opportunities they deserve!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: But what say you, Forename? Would you be able to spare some time from the seemingly infinite number of responsibilities that require your attention?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Wonderful! I'm counting on both of you!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: F'lhaminn and Rowena have already left if you're wondering─they intend to do some sightseeing in town before returning home. I do hope you were able to enjoy our teatime together. I can think of none more deserving of a brief respite.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I must apologize, however, for dragging you into this matter. You deserve a full explanation─but not here. Would you care to meet me at my home?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Splendid. I shall be awaiting you at the Leveilleur estate.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Thank you for humoring me, Forename─and welcome once again!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: For years, I've supported my children from afar as a sponsor of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn. Yet even though the Scions have disbanded, it has done little to diminish my desire to be of service.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: That is why I decided it is past time I made my own contribution to the world...to this star that you and my children have sacrificed so much to save.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: But I am merely one person. My resources limited. Words can ill express how grateful I am for your aid.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: In time, I hope you will come to see me not only as the mother of Alphinaud and Alisaie, but as your partner and friend. As I said before, I am counting on you, Forename.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Now, there is, in fact, another reason I invited you here. The Leveilleur household will also be partaking in the homestead program, and I have already accepted a student.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: She comes from a family of accomplished alchemists, hailing from Thavnair. Meryld has already gone to fetch her from the port, so I imagine she will arrive ere long.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: Lady Ameliance, I pray I did not keep you waiting overlong. Miss Miladeen has arrived.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: N-N-Nice to meet you! I am Miladeen, freshly arrived from Thavnair. It is a p-pleasure to make your acquaintance!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Oh, the pleasure is all mine, I'm sure! You must be utterly exhausted after such a long voyage.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: I am Ameliance, and standing beside me is none other than─

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: O-Oh, I know! It's Mistress AlisaieMaster Alphinaud, isn't it!?

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: ...Hah! I'm afraid not, my dear.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: This charming personage beside me is in fact Forename, my business partner. Better known as the hero who saved our star from the Final Days.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Ah! I'm so sorry, it was rude of me to presume! I have heard much and more of your many heroic deeds in Thavnair, but I've never had a face to put to the name...

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: P-Putting that aside, it is a dream come true for me to finally stand in the magnificent halls of the Studium...I could collapse with happiness on this very spot!

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: With these dignified walls surrounding me, I feel as though I stand in the very annals of history itself! My mind wanders to the countless brilliant minds who made discovery after discovery here.

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: Erm, Miss Miladeen... I'm afraid it is not the Studium, but the Leveilleur estate in which you stand. This residence shall be your lodgings for the duration of your stay.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: It may take some getting used to, but it is my wish that you come to feel at home here.

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Th-This...is your home!?

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: Ahem! Though I have much to learn─and the thought of your present impression of me fills me with dread─I hope that we can get along!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Oh, you needn't be so formal. Tell me, what can we do to make you feel more comfortable?

dialogue.name: MILADEEN
dialogue.text: I-I know! Please call me Mila! That's what my folks back home call me, while Miladeen is...usually reserved for when I'm in trouble...

dialogue.name: MERYLD
dialogue.text: Pray forgive me, but I'm afraid I must continue to observe formalities, Miss Miladeen. If it please you, I shall escort you to your room.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: A number of other families will also be opening up their homes to students from abroad in the coming days. I must set a good example as the first host mother, for if all goes to plan, we can expand the program to include even more students!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Let us waste no time─there is plenty of work to be done!

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: Classes at the Studium will begin once students have had time to settle in. I would like to use this period to procure all of the necessities needed for their matriculation.

dialogue.name: AMELIANCE
dialogue.text: You may find any materials you need by speaking with Synnove, the apothecary, in the Agora. Let us give the students the welcome they deserve!
